General.Name: Chuwa Wool Industry Co Taiwan Ltd
General.Description: Ascent Development Co., Ltd sells wool tops, superwash wool tops, and seperwash loose wool products in Taiwan. It also leases real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Chuwa Wool Industry Co., (Taiwan) Ltd. and changed its name to Ascent Development Co., Ltd in August 2022. Ascent Development Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1964 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 557-1, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 110055

1.Name: Mr. Chien-Chang  Lo
